messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Blood type diets
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/13/00 10:27:08 PM Central Daylight Time, bonniepainter@hotmail.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/13/00 10:27:08 PM Central Daylight Time,
bonniepainter@... writes:

<< It's called "Eating for Your Type" I think. I bet if you did a search on
Amazon you could come up with it. I have seen the book and it says that my
blood type should be vegetarian (which is funny, because I'm not a
vegetarian, but I really don't like a lot of meat)

>>
I have heard of this, too. I saw an article on it in a magazine from the
Health food store nearby. Interestingly, I am type O blood, and it said that
I would be a meat eater, which coincidentally- or not- I am. It helps me to
have the higher protein my system needs in light of being intolerant of many
carbohydrates that raise my blood sugar level. ~Karen
